H0.text: What was the name of the character played by Ralph Fiennes in 'Schindler's List'. Amon

H1.text: What was the name of the character played by Ralph Fiennes in 'Schindler's List'. Klaus

H2.text: What was the name of the character played by Ralph Fiennes in 'Schindler's List'. Heinrich

H3.text: What was the name of the character played by Ralph Fiennes in 'Schindler's List'. Göth

A4.text: Göth is portrayed by Ralph Fiennes in the 1993 film Schindler's List.

A5.text: The 1993 film Schindler's List, in which Göth is portrayed by Ralph Fiennes, depicts his running of the Płaszów concentration camp.
